name: apex-language-server-extension
description: VSCode extension for Apex Language Server

apex.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the Apex language server

apex.debug.description: Run Apex language server in debug mode

apex.debugPort.description: Port to use for debugging (0 for random port)

apex.commentCollection.enableCommentColl.description: Enable comment collection during document parsing

apex.commentCollection.associateComments.description: Associate comments with symbols for enhanced language features (may impact performance)

apex.commentCollection.enableForDocument.description: Enable comment collection for document change events
Enable comment collection for document open events
Enable comment collection for document symbols (may impact performance)

apex.commentCollection.enableForFoldingR.description: Enable comment collection for folding ranges (may impact performance)

apex.performance.commentCollectionMaxFil.description: Maximum file size (in bytes) for comment collection. Files larger than this will skip comment collection for performance.

apex.performance.useAsyncCommentProcessi.description: Use asynchronous comment processing to improve performance

apex.performance.documentChangeDebounceM.description: Debounce delay (in milliseconds) for document change processing

apex.environment.enablePerformanceLoggin.description: Enable performance logging for the language server

apex.resources.loadMode.description: Resource loading mode for Apex standard library files. 'full' loads all resources immediately (faster access, higher memory usage), 'lazy' loads resources on-demand (lower memory usage, slight access delay)

apex.inspector.enabled.description: Enable LSP request/response inspector for debugging

scripts.bundle: tsup && shx mkdir -p extension/dist/snippets && shx cp -R snippets/* extension/dist/snippets/ && shx cp -R grammars extension/dist/ && shx cp language-configuration.json extension/dist/ && shx cp bundle/extension.js extension/dist/extension.js && shx mkdir -p extension/dist/server-bundle && shx cp -R ../apex-ls-node/bundle/* extension/dist/server-bundle/
scripts.clean: rimraf dist bundle extension .turbo coverage grammars node_modules tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
